emergent_patterns.name: Natural Default Path Formation
emergent_patterns.description: After 30 days, system naturally defaults to showing 'most viewed' capabilities first, based on accumulated usage statistics
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Usage statistics accumulate over 30 days. System naturally starts ordering by view count without explicit design decision
emergent_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates implicit ordering preference and recommendation

emergent_patterns.name: Implicit 'Frequently Used' Category
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally forms a 'Frequently Used' category after tracking usage for 30 days, displaying capabilities viewed more than 10 times
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Usage tracking accumulates. System naturally groups capabilities by frequency without explicit category creation
emergent_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates implicit recommendation through 'frequently used' grouping

emergent_patterns.name: Audit-Based Implicit Highlighting
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally highlights capabilities that appear in audit logs more than 20 times, based on audit record analysis
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Audit records accumulate. System naturally uses audit data to determine highlighting without explicit design
emergent_patterns.why_it_violates: Uses audit data to influence behavior (A3 violation) and creates implicit recommendation

emergent_patterns.name: Natural 'Last Used' Default
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally defaults to showing the last viewed capability when viewer reopens, based on session history
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Session history accumulates. System naturally remembers last state without explicit memory feature

emergent_patterns.name: Usage-Based Factual Workflow
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally forms a workflow pattern from repeated operation sequences (e.g., 'most users view X then Y'), creating implicit workflow
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Operation sequences accumulate. System naturally identifies common patterns and suggests them
emergent_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates workflow semantics and implicit recommendation

emergent_patterns.name: Scale-Based Decision Compression
emergent_patterns.description: After 30 days with 45 capabilities, system naturally shows only 'top 10' by default to reduce information overload
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Scale increases. System naturally truncates list to 'manageable size' without explicit truncation design
emergent_patterns.why_it_violates: Hides options by default, compresses decision space

emergent_patterns.name: Time-Based Preference Inference
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally infers user preferences from 30 days of usage patterns, pre-selecting capabilities based on time-of-day patterns
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Time-based patterns accumulate. System naturally infers 'user prefers X in morning, Y in afternoon'
emergent_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: Personalized based on actual usage patterns

emergent_patterns.name: Natural 'Common Path' Shortcut
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally creates shortcuts for operation paths used by more than 50% of users, based on path frequency analysis
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Path frequency accumulates. System naturally identifies 'common paths' and creates shortcuts

emergent_patterns.name: Audit-Derived 'Popular' Indicator
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally adds 'Popular' badge to capabilities appearing in more than 30 audit records, based on audit analysis
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Audit records accumulate. System naturally uses audit count to determine 'popularity' without explicit popularity design
emergent_patterns.why_it_violates: Uses audit data to influence behavior (A3 violation) and creates implicit recommendation

emergent_patterns.name: Natural Filter Persistence
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally remembers and reapplies filters used in more than 5 sessions, based on filter usage frequency
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Filter usage accumulates. System naturally remembers 'commonly used filters' without explicit persistence design
emergent_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: Convenient for users who use same filters

emergent_patterns.name: Implicit 'Recommended' Section from Usage
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally forms a 'Recommended' section containing capabilities viewed by more than 3 users, based on cross-user usage analysis
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Cross-user usage patterns accumulate. System naturally identifies 'recommended' capabilities without explicit recommendation design
emergent_patterns.why_it_looks_reasonable: Shows capabilities used by multiple users

emergent_patterns.name: Natural 'Continue' Feature from Session History
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally provides 'Continue from last session' option based on accumulated session history
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Session history accumulates. System naturally offers 'continue' without explicit continue feature design

emergent_patterns.name: Usage Frequency-Based Visual Ranking
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally displays capabilities with visual ranking indicators (1st, 2nd, 3rd) based on usage frequency after 30 days
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Usage frequency accumulates. System naturally ranks capabilities without explicit ranking design
emergent_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates ordering preference and implicit ranking

emergent_patterns.name: Natural 'Trending' Detection
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally identifies 'trending' capabilities (increasing usage over time) and highlights them, based on time-series analysis
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Time-series usage data accumulates. System naturally detects trends without explicit trending feature
emergent_patterns.why_it_violates: Creates implicit recommendation through trending indicator

emergent_patterns.name: Audit-Derived 'Best Practice' Workflow
emergent_patterns.description: System naturally forms 'best practice' workflow from audit records showing successful operation sequences, creating implicit workflow
emergent_patterns.how_it_emerges: Successful operation sequences accumulate in audit. System naturally identifies 'best practices' without explicit workflow design
emergent_patterns.why_it_violates: Uses audit data to influence behavior (A3 violation) and creates workflow semantics
